Mace_Blast.help: The Bane Mace is capable of firing a bolt of kinetic energy. The blast is powerful enough that it may knockback some foes. Arachnos Bane Spider Troopers call this the Power Blast. The Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Mace_Beam.help: Fires an extremely long range and accurate beam of kinetic Energy from the Bane Mace that deals tremendous damage and knocks the target back. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Disruptor_Blast.help: Fires a tremendous charge of kinetic energy from your Executioner's Mace. This charge is so powerful it will explode on impact, blasting all nearby foes. Some affected foes may be knocked back by the force of the blast. You must be level 44 and have two other Mace Mastery powers before selecting this power. You must be level 41 and have Mace Blast or Mace Beam before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Disruptor_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Foe Knockback

Web_Cocoon.help: The Bane Mace can fire a more powerful version the common web grenade. The sinewy fibers of this grenade are strong enough to completely Hold one target. Targets able to resist the Hold are still likely to have their attack and movement speed dramatically slowed. Web Cocoon can also bring down flying targets and prevent foes from jumping. You must be level 41 and have Mace Blast or Mace Beam before selecting this power. Recharge: Long
Web_Cocoon.targetHelp: You have been caught in a Web Cocoon and are Held. You cannot move or fly and your attack and movement speed is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Summon_Spiderlings.help: Black Scorpion has granted you access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Spiderlings. Three Spiderlings that are one level less than you will show up when summoned. Your access to these Arachnobots is very limited. You can only summon them once every 15 minutes and they will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
